title: Can't Connect to Game After Champ Select
body:
This happened twice today, ended up with remakes. After champion select I would just be directed to the reconnect screen, but it wouldn't connect to the game. "Another instance of the league client is running" would show up after I clicked reconnect . This happened with both the legacy and alpha client. 

I tried sending a support ticket about this, but I couldn't attach the game logs because the size exceeded 20 MB (log size was 50.9 MB).

replies.body:
I've seen this error a number of times, and it's typically been the result of certain network settings that just don't place nicely with League. I'd suggest working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local network settings have been configured for League properly.

If you still experience these symptoms after having worked through our guide, please let me know.
